name: Portia Ltd
legal: Not For Profit Company limited by guarantee
goal: Portia Ltd designs and implements effective, evidence-based strategies for advancing quality of research and innovation by addressing common gender problems in institutional practices, in science knowledge making, in human capital development, and in implementation of legislation. Our work covers gender equality issues in STEM and gender dimension in research and innovation content, process and impact across wide variety of science (STEM) fields and endeavours.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Portia is part of a consortium delivering GenPORT, an FP7 - funded project.
Portia is consortium partner in GENERA project, funded under Horizon 2020.
